scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:TW
scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p build/ && cp node_modules/tiddlywiki/editions/empty/tiddlywiki.info build/ && node bin/updateVersion.js
scripts.serve: (sleep 2 && open-cli http://127.0.0.1:8080 &) && cp node_modules/tiddlywiki/editions/server/tiddlywiki.info build/ && tiddlywiki ++./plugin build --verbose --listen
